summary: Use this API to get the list of all active shipping providers, which is needed when working with the PackOrder API
description: Use this API to get the list of all active shipping providers, which is needed when working with the PackOrder API.

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/order/shipment/providers/get')
request.add_api_parameter("getShipmentProvidersReq", "{\"orders\":[{\"order_id\":\"23423423\",\"order_item_ids\":[\"[2342342,23423]\",\"[2342342,23423]\"]},{\"order_id\":\"23423423\",\"order_item_ids\":[\"[2342342,23423]\",\"[2342342,23423]\"]}]}")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/order/shipment/providers/get')
request.add_api_param('getShipmentProvidersReq', '{\"orders\":[{\"order_id\":\"23423423\",\"order_item_ids\":[\"[2342342,23423]\",\"[2342342,23423]\"]},{\"order_id\":\"23423423\",\"order_item_ids\":[\"[2342342,23423]\",\"[2342342,23423]\"]}]}')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
